about_the_game:
Glowing Stones: Heroes' Awakening - Bonus Pack will give you access to a range of content developed over the course of the game's early access period.

At present, it contains the Choice Guide, integrated directly into the game.


It will enable you to make each of your choices with full knowledge of the facts, and unlock a maximum number of naughty scenes and images.

There is also the jukebox, integrated in the game too.


And the soundtrack itself, in HD, is include in the game directory!

What's more, the aim of this pack is also to offer you other additional content in the future. For example:
- PDF guide
- Background elements
- Alternative drawings and designs
- Etc.

The price of this pack will increase as additional features and content are added.

content_descriptors.notes:
Glowing Stones is an Adult Visual Novel where the main focus is on the story and in that story, you will find yourself immersed in a world of corporate corruption and greed, superpowers and superheroes with romance that you can experience with 6 characters. 
All is consensual between the characters. The primary focus of this game is the path to romance the five main characters (and the story is realistic about it), but it's totally possible and effective to get a monogamous relationship as well.
In the game you'll see : 
- Nudity (uncensored)
- Graphical representation of sex scenes (uncensored)
